attributes.action: scrap fortnightly bin collection from households, reinstate weekly collection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that we pay very highly for council tax, and have always enjoyed weekly collection of our bins / waste.  We feel that fortnightly collections are:

* it an infringement of our existing rights
* poor value for money for our council tax
* an environmental hazard, with waste remaining uncollected for long periods of time.

We feel the government should ensure that weekly bin collections are reinstated for those areas currently with fortnightly collections, and no further moves made to fortnightly bin collections in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
